name: BlueSyncGuard
description: A Bluetooth monitoring and security tool designed to safeguard devices by continuously tracking and analyzing Bluetooth connections to prevent unauthorized access.

name: ELSA
description: Efficient Local Support Assistant (ELSA) is a desktop voice assistant developed to streamline productivity by executing voice commands for various tasks such as launching applications, searching the web, and automating repetitive workflows.

name: Hostel ERP
description: Developed a full-stack hostel management system serving 500+ students and staff, resulting in a 60% reduction in administrative processing time. Backend handling 1000+ daily transactions with 99.9% uptime. It is built using MERN stack and React Native.

name: Daily News Mobile App
description: A news portal app providing real-time news from various media outlets in one place. Developed using JAVA, XML, and Android Studio, the app features a clean UI for seamless user interaction.

name: CrayonD
description: CrayonD is an AI-powered digital design assistant that transforms text prompts into beautiful illustrations and UI concepts. It leverages generative AI models and a collaborative canvas to help designers brainstorm, prototype, and iterate faster.

name: Stray To Stay
description: An Android application built for the welfare of street animals, offering a social media-like platform for animal lovers to connect, share, and support. Created using JAVA, XML, and Android Studio.

name: SAM (Simple Assistant Model)
description: SAM is a desktop voice assistant developed in Python to perform essential tasks such as launching applications, searching the web, answering queries, and automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity.

name: Chatting Web-App
description: A real-time chatting platform created using the MERN stack and Socket.io. It features a responsive front-end built with React.js, a robust backend with Node.js and Express.js, and MongoDB for database storage.

name: CraftMyCV
description: An intuitive resume builder web application developed using the MERN stack. It enables users to create professional resumes with ease, leveraging a modern and user-friendly interface.

name: FlowBee
description: A LinkedIn web crawler and scraper developed in Python to dynamically extract data from LinkedIn profiles and store it in a MySQL database. The tool supports analytics and can crawl over 500 unique connections at a time.
